alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 3:56PM CDT until August 06 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JACKSON AND NORTHEASTERN DEKALB COUNTIES... At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Henagar, or 10 miles northeast of Fort Payne, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Payne, Henagar, Stevenson, Sylvania, Ider, Valley Head, Hammondville, Mentone, Fabius and Higdon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
